meetings.transcript:
Meeting started at 2:00 PM.

Boss: Welcome everyone to our Q4 planning session. Let's start with the budget review.

User: I've prepared the initial budget numbers. We're looking at a 15% increase in marketing spend, primarily for the mobile app launch.

Designer: That sounds good, but we need to consider the design team's needs too. We're planning to hire two more designers for the mobile app project.

Boss: What's the timeline for the mobile app launch?

User: We're targeting end of Q4, but that depends on getting the budget approved quickly.

Designer: I can have the final designs ready by end of January.

Boss: Perfect. Let's set the budget approval deadline for Friday. User, can you have the detailed breakdown ready by then?

User: Yes, I'll have it ready by Friday.

Boss: Great. Any other items for today?

Designer: Just a quick note - we should schedule user testing sessions for the mobile app in February.

Boss: Good point. Let's add that to the timeline.

Meeting ended at 3:00 PM.

Meeting started at 10:00 AM.

Designer: Thanks for joining the design review. I've updated the mobile app designs based on our previous feedback.

User: These look much better. I like the new color scheme.

Designer: Great! I've also improved the navigation flow. Users can now access all features within 3 taps.

User: That's excellent. How does this affect the development timeline?

Designer: The new design adds about 2 weeks to the development time, but it will provide a much better user experience.

User: That's acceptable. When can you have the final designs ready?

Designer: I can have everything finalized by end of January.

User: Perfect. Let's schedule another review next week to check the progress.

Designer: Sounds good. I'll send you an invite.

Meeting ended at 10:45 AM.

Meeting started at 9:00 AM.

User: Good morning everyone. Let's go around and share our progress.

Developer1: I completed the website homepage redesign yesterday. All tests are passing.

Developer2: I'm working on the mobile app backend. Should be done by Friday.

Designer: I'm finishing up the mobile app designs. On track for end of January.

User: Great progress everyone. Any blockers?

Developer1: We need the final design assets for the mobile app.

Designer: I'll have them ready by Friday.

Developer2: Perfect. That works for my timeline.

User: Excellent. Let's keep up the good work. Meeting adjourned.

Meeting ended at 9:30 AM.
